titleStmt.title: A catalogue of approved divinity-books which have been printed or reprinted about twenty years past, and continued down to this present year, 1657, mensis Junii 18.
titleStmt.author: Rothwell, John, d. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Rothwell by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"A catalogue of sermons upon sundry occasions : some printed long since, others of late years" is on p. 69-95.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
